verses.verse: וְלִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> ve-liv-Nei of the sons אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron of Aaron מַחְלְקוֹתָ֑ם <WH4256> mach-le-ko-Tam; Now [these are] the divisions בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The sons אַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron, of Aaron נָדָב֙ <WH5070> na-Dav Nadab וַאֲבִיה֔וּא <WH30> va-'a-vi-Hu, and Abihu אֶלְעָזָ֖ר <WH499> 'el-'a-Zar Eleazar וְאִיתָמָֽר׃ <WH385> ve-'i-ta-Mar. and Ithamar

וַיָּ֨מָת <WH4191> vai-Ya-mot died נָדָ֤ב <WH5070> na-Dav But Nadab וַאֲבִיהוּא֙ <WH30> va-'a-vi-Hu and Abihu לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lif-Nei before אֲבִיהֶ֔ם <WH1> 'a-vi-Hem, their father וּבָנִ֖ים <WH1121> u-va-Nim and had no children לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- no הָי֣וּ <WH1961> ha-Yu and had לָהֶ֑ם <WH1992> la-Hem; like וַֽיְכַהֲנ֔וּ <WH3547> vay-cha-ha-Nu, executed the priest's office אֶלְעָזָ֖ר <WH499> 'el-'a-Zar therefore Eleazar וְאִיתָמָֽר׃ <WH385> ve-'i-ta-Mar. and Ithamar

וַיֶּֽחָלְקֵ֣ם <WH2505> vai-ye-chal-Kem distributed דָּוִ֔יד <WH1732> da-Vid, And David וְצָדוֹק֙ <WH6659> ve-tza-dOk them both Zadok מִן־ <WH4480> min- at בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei of the sons אֶלְעָזָ֔ר <WH499> 'el-'a-Zar, of Eleazar וַאֲחִימֶ֖לֶךְ <WH288> va-'a-chi-Me-lech and Ahimelech מִן־ <WH4480> min- at בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei of the sons אִיתָמָ֑ר <WH385> 'i-ta-Mar; of Ithamar לִפְקֻדָּתָ֖ם <WH6486> lif-kud-da-Tam according to their offices בַּעֲבֹדָתָֽם׃ <WH5656> ba-'a-vo-da-Tam. in their service

וַיִּמָּצְא֣וּ <WH4672> vai-yim-ma-tze-'U found בְֽנֵי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- of the sons אֶלְעָזָ֡ר <WH499> 'el-'a-Zar of Eleazar רַבִּ֞ים <WH7227> rab-Bim And there were more לְרָאשֵׁ֧י <WH7218> le-ra-Shei chief הַגְּבָרִ֛ים <WH1397> hag-ge-va-Rim men מִן־ <WH4480> min- than בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei than of the sons אִיתָמָ֖ר <WH385> 'i-ta-Mar of Ithamar וַֽיַּחְלְק֑וּם <WH2505> vai-yach-le-Kum; and [thus] were they divided לִבְנֵ֨י <WH1121> liv-Nei Among the sons אֶלְעָזָ֜ר <WH499> 'el-'a-Zar of Eleazar רָאשִׁ֤ים <WH7218> ra-Shim chief men לְבֵית־ <WH1004> le-veit- of the house אָבוֹת֙ <WH1> a-Vot of [their] fathers שִׁשָּׁ֣ה <WH8337> shish-Shah six עָשָׂ֔ר <WH6240> 'a-Sar, teen וְלִבְנֵ֧י <WH1121> ve-liv-Nei among the sons אִיתָמָ֛ר <WH385> 'i-ta-Mar of Ithamar לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> le-Veit according to the house אֲבוֹתָ֖ם <WH1> a-vo-Tam of their fathers שְׁמוֹנָֽה׃ <WH8083> she-mo-Nah. and eight

וַיַּחְלְק֥וּם <WH2505> vai-yach-le-Kum Thus were they divided בְּגוֹרָל֖וֹת <WH1486> be-go-ra-Lot by lot אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh one sort עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with אֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh; with another כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- for הָי֤וּ <WH1961> ha-Yu become שָֽׂרֵי־ <WH8269> sa-rei- for the governors קֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH6944> ko-desh of the sanctuary וְשָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> ve-sa-Rei and governors הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him, [of the house] of God מִבְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> mib-be-Nei were of the sons אֶלְעָזָ֖ר <WH499> 'el-'a-Zar of Eleazar וּבִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> u-viv-Nei and of the sons אִיתָמָֽר׃ <WH385> 'i-ta-Mar. of Ithamar ס sa-Mek

וַֽיִּכְתְּבֵ֡ם <WH3789> vai-yich-te-Vem wrote שְֽׁמַֽעְיָה֩ <WH8098> she-ma'-Yah And Shemaiah בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son נְתַנְאֵ֨ל <WH5417> ne-tan-'El of Nethaneel הַסּוֹפֵ֜ר <WH5608> has-so-Fer the scribe מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הַלֵּוִ֗י <WH3881> hal-le-Vi, [one] of the Levites לִפְנֵ֨י <WH6440> lif-Nei them before הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech the king וְהַשָּׂרִים֙ <WH8269> ve-has-sa-Rim and the princes וְצָד֣וֹק <WH6659> ve-tza-Dok and Zadok הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <WH3548> hak-ko-Hen, the priest וַאֲחִימֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH288> va-'a-chi-Me-lech and Ahimelech בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son אֶבְיָתָ֔ר <WH54> 'ev-ya-Tar, of Abiathar וְרָאשֵׁי֙ <WH7218> ve-ra-Shei and [before] the chief הָֽאָב֔וֹת <WH1> ha-'a-Vot, of the fathers לַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> lak-ko-ha-Nim of the priests וְלַלְוִיִּ֑ם <WH3881> ve-lal-vi-Yim; and Levites בֵּֽית־ <WH1004> beit- household אָ֣ב <WH1> 'av principal אֶחָ֗ד <WH259> 'e-Chad, one אָחֻז֙ <WH270> 'a-Chuz being taken לְאֶלְעָזָ֔ר <WH499> le-'el-'a-Zar, for Eleazar וְאָחֻ֥ז׀ <WH270> ve-'a-Chuz and [one] taken אָחֻ֖ז <WH270> 'a-Chuz taken לְאִיתָמָֽר׃ <WH385> le-'i-ta-Mar. for Ithamar פ Peh

וַיֵּצֵ֞א <WH3318> vai-ye-Tze came forth הַגּוֹרָ֤ל <WH1486> hag-go-Ral lot הָרִאשׁוֹן֙ <WH7223> ha-ri-shOn Now the first לִיה֣וֹיָרִ֔יב <WH3080> li-Ho-ya-Riv, to Jehoiarib לִֽידַעְיָ֖ה <WH3048> li-da'-Yah to Jedaiah הַשֵּׁנִֽי׃ <WH8145> hash-she-Ni. the second
לְחָרִם֙ <WH2766> le-cha-Rim to Harim הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <WH7992> hash-she-li-Shi, The third לִשְׂעֹרִ֖ים <WH8188> lis-'o-Rim to Seorim הָרְבִעִֽי׃ <WH7243> ha-re-vi-'I. the fourth
לְמַלְכִּיָּה֙ <WH4441> le-mal-ki-Yah to Malchijah הַחֲמִישִׁ֔י <WH2549> ha-cha-mi-Shi, The fifth לְמִיָּמִ֖ן <WH4326> le-mi-ya-Min to Mijamin הַשִּׁשִּֽׁי׃ <WH8345> hash-shish-Shi. the sixth
לְהַקּוֹץ֙ <WH6976> le-hak-kOtz to Hakkoz הַשְּׁבִעִ֔י <WH7637> hash-she-vi-'I, The seventh לַאֲבִיָּ֖ה <WH29> la-'a-vi-Yah to Abijah הַשְּׁמִינִֽי׃ <WH8066> hash-she-mi-Ni. the eighth
לְיֵשׁ֙וּעַ֙ <WH3442> le-ye-Shu-a' to Jeshua הַתְּשִׁעִ֔י <WH8671> hat-te-shi-'I, The ninth לִשְׁכַנְיָ֖הוּ <WH7935> lish-chan-Ya-hu to Shecaniah הָעֲשִׂרִֽי׃ <WH6224> ha-'a-si-Ri. the tenth

לְאֶלְיָשִׁיב֙ <WH475> le-'el-ya-Shiv to Eliashib עַשְׁתֵּ֣י <WH6249> 'ash-Tei eleven עָשָׂ֔ר <WH6240> 'a-Sar, ten לְיָקִ֖ים <WH3356> le-ya-Kim to Jakim שְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> 'a-Sar. ten

לְחֻפָּה֙ <WH2647> le-chup-Pah to Huppah שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <WH7969> she-lo-Shah three עָשָׂ֔ר <WH6240> 'a-Sar, ten לְיֶֽשֶׁבְאָ֖ב <WH3428> le-ye-shev-'Av to Jeshebeab אַרְבָּעָ֥ה <WH702> 'ar-ba-'Ah four עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> 'a-Sar. teen

לְבִלְגָּה֙ <WH1083> le-vil-Gah to Bilgah חֲמִשָּׁ֣ה <WH2568> cha-mish-Shah fif עָשָׂ֔ר <WH6240> 'a-Sar, teen לְאִמֵּ֖ר <WH564> le-'im-Mer to Immer שִׁשָּׁ֥ה <WH8337> shish-Shah six עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> 'a-Sar. teen

לְחֵזִיר֙ <WH2387> le-che-Zir to Hezir שִׁבְעָ֣ה <WH7651> shiv-'Ah seven עָשָׂ֔ר <WH6240> 'a-Sar, teen לְהַפִּצֵּ֖ץ <WH6483> le-hap-pitz-Tzetz to Aphses שְׁמוֹנָ֥ה <WH8083> she-mo-Nah eight עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> 'a-Sar. teen

לִֽפְתַחְיָה֙ <WH6611> lif-tach-Yah to Pethahiah תִּשְׁעָ֣ה <WH8672> tish-'Ah nine עָשָׂ֔ר <WH6240> 'a-Sar, teen לִֽיחֶזְקֵ֖אל <WH3168> li-chez-Kel to Jehezekel הָעֶשְׂרִֽים׃ <WH6242> ha-'es-Rim. the twentieth

לְיָכִין֙ <WH3199> le-ya-Chin to Jachin אֶחָ֣ד <WH259> 'e-Chad The one וְעֶשְׂרִ֔ים <WH6242> ve-'es-Rim, and twentieth לְגָמ֖וּל <WH1577> le-ga-Mul to Gamul שְׁנַ֥יִם <WH8147> she-Na-yim the two וְעֶשְׂרִֽים׃ <WH6242> ve-'es-Rim. and twentieth

לִדְלָיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH1806> lid-la-Ya-hu to Delaiah שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <WH7969> she-lo-Shah The three וְעֶשְׂרִ֔ים <WH6242> ve-'es-Rim, and twentieth לְמַֽעַזְיָ֖הוּ <WH4590> le-ma-'az-Ya-hu to Maaziah אַרְבָּעָ֥ה <WH702> 'ar-ba-'Ah the four וְעֶשְׂרִֽים׃ <WH6242> ve-'es-Rim. and twentieth פ Peh

אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh These פְקֻדָּתָ֞ם <WH6486> fe-kud-da-Tam These [were] the orderings לַעֲבֹדָתָ֗ם <WH5656> la-'a-vo-da-Tam, of them in their service לָב֤וֹא <WH935> la-Vo to come לְבֵית־ <WH1004> le-veit- into the house יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD כְּמִשְׁפָּטָ֔ם <WH4941> ke-mish-pa-Tam, according to their manner בְּיַ֖ד <WH3027> be-Yad under אַהֲרֹ֣ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron Aaron אֲבִיהֶ֑ם <WH1> 'a-vi-Hem; their father כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after צִוָּ֔הוּ <WH6680> tziv-Va-hu, had commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh as the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel פ Peh

וְלִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> ve-liv-Nei of the sons לֵוִ֖י <WH3878> le-Vi of Levi הַנּוֹתָרִ֑ים <WH3498> han-no-ta-Rim; And the rest לִבְנֵ֤י <WH1121> liv-Nei [were these] Of the sons עַמְרָם֙ <WH6019> 'am-Ram of Amram שֽׁוּבָאֵ֔ל <WH7619> shu-va-'El, Shubael לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> liv-Nei of the sons שׁוּבָאֵ֖ל <WH7619> shu-va-'El of Shubael יֶחְדְּיָֽהוּ׃ <WH3165> yech-de-Ya-hu. Jehdeiah

לִרְחַבְיָ֑הוּ <WH7345> lir-chav-Ya-hu; Concerning Rehabiah לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> liv-Nei of the sons רְחַבְיָ֔הוּ <WH7345> re-chav-Ya-hu, of Rehabiah הָרֹ֖אשׁ <WH7218> ha-Rosh the first יִשִּׁיָּֽה׃ <WH3449> yish-shi-Yah. [was] Isshiah

לַיִּצְהָרִ֣י <WH3325> lai-yitz-ha-Ri Of the Izharites שְׁלֹמ֔וֹת <WH8013> she-lo-Mot, Shelomoth לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> liv-Nei of the sons שְׁלֹמ֖וֹת <WH8013> she-lo-Mot of Shelomoth יָֽחַת׃ <WH3189> Ya-chat. Jahath

וּבְנָ֖י <WH1121> u-ve-Nai And the sons יְרִיָּ֑הוּ <WH3404> ye-ri-Ya-hu; [of Hebron] Jeriah אֲמַרְיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH568> 'a-mar-Ya-hu [the first] Amariah הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <WH8145> hash-she-Ni, the second יַחֲזִיאֵל֙ <WH3166> ya-cha-zi-'El Jahaziel הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <WH7992> hash-she-li-Shi, the third יְקַמְעָ֖ם <WH3360> ye-kam-'Am Jekameam הָרְבִיעִֽי׃ <WH7243> ha-re-vi-'I. the fourth

בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> be-Nei [Of] the sons עֻזִּיאֵל֙ <WH5816> 'uz-zi-'El of Uzziel מִיכָ֔ה <WH4318> mi-Chah, Michah לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> liv-Nei of the sons מִיכָ֖ה <WH4318> mi-Chah of Michah; שָׁמוּר sha-mur כשָׁמִֽיר׃ <WH8053> sha-Mir. Shamir ק

אֲחִ֤י <WH251> 'a-Chi The brother מִיכָה֙ <WH4318> mi-Chah of Michah יִשִּׁיָּ֔ה <WH3449> yish-shi-Yah, [was] Isshiah לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> liv-Nei of the sons יִשִּׁיָּ֖ה <WH3449> yish-shi-Yah of Isshiah זְכַרְיָֽהוּ׃ <WH2148> ze-char-Ya-hu. Zechariah

בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> be-Nei The sons מְרָרִי֙ <WH4847> me-ra-Ri of Merari מַחְלִ֣י <WH4249> mach-Li [were] Mahli וּמוּשִׁ֔י <WH4187> u-mu-Shi, and Mushi בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> be-Nei the sons יַעֲזִיָּ֥הֽוּ <WH3269> ya-'a-zi-Ya-hu of Jaaziah בְנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> ve-No. Beno

בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> be-Nei The sons מְרָרִ֑י <WH4847> me-ra-Ri; of Merari לְיַֽעֲזִיָּ֣הֽוּ <WH3269> le-ya-'a-zi-Ya-hu by Jaaziah בְנ֔וֹ <WH1121> ve-No, Beno וְשֹׁ֥הַם <WH7719> ve-Sho-ham and Shoham וְזַכּ֖וּר <WH2139> ve-zak-Kur and Zaccur וְעִבְרִֽי׃ <WH5681> ve-'iv-Ri. and Ibri
לְמַחְלִי֙ <WH4249> le-mach-Li Of Mahli אֶלְעָזָ֔ר <WH499> 'el-'a-Zar, [came] Eleazar וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- no הָ֥יָה <WH1961> Ha-yah had ל֖וֹ lo בָּנִֽים׃ <WH1121> ba-Nim. who had no sons
לְקִ֖ישׁ <WH7027> le-Kish Concerning Kish בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> be-nei- the son קִ֥ישׁ <WH7027> kish of Kish יְרַחְמְאֵֽל׃ <WH3396> ye-rach-me-'El. [was] Jerahmeel

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei The sons מוּשִׁ֔י <WH4187> mu-Shi, also of Mushi מַחְלִ֥י <WH4249> mach-Li Mahli וְעֵ֖דֶר <WH5740> ve-'E-der and Eder וִירִימ֑וֹת <WH3406> vi-ri-Mot; and Jerimoth אֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh These בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei These [were] the sons הַלְוִיִּ֖ם <WH3881> hal-vi-Yim of the Levites לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> le-Veit after the house אֲבֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH1> 'a-vo-tei-Hem. of their fathers

וַיַּפִּילוּ֩ <WH5307> vai-yap-pi-Lu These likewise cast גַם־ <WH1571> gam- also הֵ֨ם <WH1992> hem These גּוֹרָל֜וֹת <WH1486> go-ra-Lot lots לְעֻמַּ֣ת׀ <WH5980> le-'um-Mat over against אֲחֵיהֶ֣ם <WH251> 'a-chei-Hem their brethren בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> be-nei- the sons אַהֲרֹ֗ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron, of Aaron לִפְנֵ֨י <WH6440> lif-Nei in the presence דָוִ֤יד <WH1732> da-Vid of David הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech the king וְצָד֣וֹק <WH6659> ve-tza-Dok and Zadok וַאֲחִימֶ֔לֶךְ <WH288> va-'a-chi-Me-lech, and Ahimelech וְרָאשֵׁי֙ <WH7218> ve-ra-Shei and the chief הָֽאָב֔וֹת <WH1> ha-'a-Vot, of the fathers לַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> lak-ko-ha-Nim of the priests וְלַלְוִיִּ֑ם <WH3881> ve-lal-vi-Yim; and Levites אָב֣וֹת <WH1> a-Vot fathers הָרֹ֔אשׁ <WH7218> ha-Rosh, even the principal לְעֻמַּ֖ת <WH5980> le-'um-Mat over against אָחִ֥יו <WH251> 'a-Chiv brethren הַקָּטָֽן׃ <WH6996> hak-ka-Tan. their younger ס sa-Mek
